mapper.update:
UPDATE u_user_extend
sex = #{sex},
nickname = #{nickname},
head_pic_url = #{headPicUrl},
name = #{name},
regtime = #{regtime},
birthday = #{birthday},
mobile = #{mobile},
qq = #{qq},
member_code = #{memberCode},
remark = #{remark},
lastlogin = #{lastlogin},
activity_info = #{activityInfo},
is_complete = #{isComplete},
device_id = #{deviceId},
device_type = #{deviceType},
weixin = #{weixin},
workaddress_id = #{workaddressId},
status = #{status},
address = #{address},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE u_user_extend SET is_deleted = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
